typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindOderDetails
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubOrders
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		Product_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubProducts
NorthwindOderDetails, DVHubOrders join(OrderID == Order_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubOrdersDetails
JoinHubOrdersDetails, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubProducts
JoinHubProducts select(mapColumn(
		Order_SID,
		Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSID
SelectSID derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'Northwind') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		RecordSource as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		Order_SID,
		RecordSource,
		LoadDate
	)) ~> DVLinkOrderDetails
